nodes.text: Pzandias was a planet in the Mid Rim's Bryx sector associated with the Confederacy of Independent Systems. During the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy, Count Dooku named Horn Ambigene Commander of Organic Training, and stationed him on Pzandias, where Ambigene was tasked with teaching other Separatists how to keep their homeworlds safe from the Republic.

Pzandias was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. The planet was originally mentioned in the Star Wars Legends continuity in The Clone Wars: Decide Your Destiny: Dooku's Secret Army, a 2010 young readers' book written by Sue Behrent.
